Please proceed with your question. And if, in fact, that happens, as you're well aware, we would have then a two-year option on Lincoln, and that's what Peter alluded to in his opening remarks of there's, I guess, an outside chance that we could, in fact, end up with an even larger aggregate transaction if in fact we close Tiverton and Biloxi first, and then came back and closed Lincoln. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. All right, so it sounds like --
 Frankly, we didn't want to deal with guidance in the first place, because --
 Well, then don't give guidance, I mean like you can't --
  -- 
 Like, I know you didn't want to do it, but you've done it, and we're just trying to understand the impacts to these variables that's embedded in those numbers, and so that's it, like the fact that you said, okay, Tropicana is zero, probably the low end, and at the high end it's the full rent assuming close, I don't know. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question.
